title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 912/93 of 19 April 1993 determining the effects on the pigmeat sector of the abolition of the supplementary trade mechanism in respect of trade between Portugal and the other Member States
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 912/93 of 19 April 1993 determining the effects on the pigmeat sector of the abolition of the supplementary trade mechanism in respect of trade between Portugal and the other Member States
THE COMMISSION OF  THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply with effect from 1 April 1993.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 19 April 1993.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 366, 29. 12. 1990, p. 33.
(2) OJ No L 387, 31. 12. 1992, p. 58.
(3) OJ No L 77, 31. 3. 1993, p. 9.
